1441950.name: RPG Maker MZ - Modern Urban Tileset
1441950.description:
From clean modern hotel entrances to bright modern casinos, there's always a need for that sleek modern element.

Created by Sherman3D, this classy tile pack is an excellent add-on to the existing RPG Maker MV / MZ material. With an emphasis on clean lines and essential objects, this pack will help you create that perfect light and airy feeling of modernity. Modern Urban Tileset includes objects and textures needed to create a hotel entrance, a modern casino and a modern boxing or wrestling ring.

Features:
  • Auto-tiles A2, A4 and A5, with recolors for more diversity.
  • Complete Tile B, with various modern objects and details.
  • Tile C, with a dazzling boxing/wrestling ring.
  • Ready to use in RPG Maker MZ.

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series only
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
1441950.supported_languages: 英语, 日语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 简体中文, 繁体中文, 韩语
